statements: DELETE FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE region_id = 1 AND region_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM immunization_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 100 AND dose_number = 1;
DELETE FROM immunization_schedule WHERE center_id = 1 AND schedule_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM immunization_schedule WHERE center_id = 2 AND region_id = 3;
DELETE FROM vaccines WHERE vaccine_name = 'Flu Vaccine';
DELETE FROM vaccination_records WHERE dosage > 2 AND vaccination_date < '2021-09-01';
DELETE FROM vaccines WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' AND storage_conditions LIKE '%-80°C%' OR storage_conditions LIKE '%2-8°C%';
